verses.verse: And after <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things I heard <S%G191><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> of much <S%G4183><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> in heaven, <S%G3321><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Alleluia; <S%G239><s%> Salvation, <S%G4991><s%> and glory, <S%G1391><s%> and honor, <S%G5092><s%> and power, <S%G1411><s%> to the Lord <S%G2962><s%> our God: <S%G2316><s%>

For true <S%G228><s%> and righteous <S%G1342><s%> are his judgments: <S%G2920><s%> for he has judged <S%G2919><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> whore, <S%G4204><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> did corrupt <S%G5351><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> with her fornication, <S%G4202><s%> and has avenged <S%G1556><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of his servants <S%G1401><s%> at <S%G1537><s%> her hand. <S%G5495><s%>
And again <S%G1208><s%> they said, <S%G2046><s%> Alleluia <S%G239><s%>And her smoke <S%G2586><s%> rose <S%G305><s%> up for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%>

And the four <S%G5064><s%> and twenty <S%G1501><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> and the four <S%G5064><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> down and worshipped <S%G4352><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> that sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Amen; <S%G281><s%> Alleluia. <S%G239><s%>

And a voice <S%G5456><s%> came <S%G1881><s%> out of the throne, <S%G2362><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Praise <S%G134><s%> our God, <S%G2316><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> you his servants, <S%G1401><s%> and you that fear <S%G5399><s%> him, both small <S%G3398><s%> and great. <S%G3173><s%>

And I heard <S%G191><s%> as it were the voice <S%G5456><s%> of a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude, <S%G3793><s%> and as the voice <S%G5456><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> waters, <S%G5204><s%> and as the voice <S%G5456><s%> of mighty <S%G2478><s%> thunder, <S%G1027><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Alleluia: <S%G239><s%> for the Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> omnipotent <S%G3841><s%> reigns. <S%G936><s%>

Let us be glad <S%G5463><s%> and rejoice, <S%G21><s%> and give <S%G1325><s%> honor <S%G1391><s%> to him: for the marriage <S%G1062><s%> of the Lamb <S%G721><s%> is come, <S%G2064><s%> and his wife <S%G1135><s%> has made <S%G2090><s%> herself <S%G1438><s%> ready. <S%G2090><s%>

And to her was granted <S%G1325><s%> that she should be arrayed <S%G4016><s%> in fine linen, <S%G1039><s%> clean <S%G2513><s%> and white: <S%G2986><s%> for the fine linen <S%G1039><s%> is the righteousness <S%G1345><s%> of saints. <S%G40><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to me, Write, <S%G1125><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are they which are called <S%G2564><s%> to the marriage <S%G1062><s%> supper <S%G1173><s%> of the Lamb. <S%G721><s%> And he said <S%G3004><s%> to me, These <S%G3778><s%> are the true <S%G228><s%> sayings <S%G3056><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And I fell <S%G4098><s%> at <S%G1715><s%> his feet <S%G4228><s%> to worship <S%G4352><s%> him. And he said <S%G3004><s%> to me, See <S%G3700><s%> you do it not: I am <S%G1510><s%> your fellow servant, <S%G4889><s%> and of your brothers <S%G80><s%> that have <S%G2192><s%> the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus: <S%G2424><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> God: <S%G2316><s%> for the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of prophecy. <S%G4394><s%>

And I saw <S%G1492><s%> heaven <S%G3321><s%> opened, <S%G455><s%> and behold <S%G2400><s%> a white <S%G3022><s%> horse; <S%G2462><s%> and he that sat <S%G2521><s%> on him was called <S%G2564><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> and True, <S%G228><s%> and in righteousness <S%G1343><s%> he does judge <S%G2919><s%> and make <S%G4170><s%> war. <S%G4170><s%>

His eyes <S%G3788><s%> were as a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire, <S%G4442><s%> and on <S%G1909><s%> his head <S%G2776><s%> were many <S%G4183><s%> crowns; <S%G1238><s%> and he had <S%G2192><s%> a name <S%G3686><s%> written, <S%G1125><s%> that no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> knew, <S%G1492><s%> but he himself.

And he was clothed <S%G4016><s%> with a clothing <S%G2440><s%> dipped <S%G911><s%> in blood: <S%G129><s%> and his name <S%G3686><s%> is called <S%G2564><s%> The Word <S%G3056><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And the armies <S%G4753><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were in heaven <S%G3321><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him on white <S%G3022><s%> horses, <S%G2462><s%> clothed <S%G1746><s%> in fine linen, <S%G1039><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> and clean. <S%G2513><s%>

And out of his mouth <S%G4750><s%> goes <S%G1607><s%> a sharp <S%G3691><s%> sword, <S%G4501><s%> that with it he should smite <S%G3960><s%> the nations: <S%G1484><s%> and he shall rule <S%G4165><s%> them with a rod <S%G4464><s%> of iron: <S%G4603><s%> and he treads <S%G3961><s%> the wine press <S%G3025><s%> <S%G3631><s%> of the fierceness <S%G2372><s%> and wrath <S%G3709><s%> of Almighty <S%G3841><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And he has <S%G2192><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his clothing <S%G2440><s%> and on <S%G1909><s%> his thigh <S%G3382><s%> a name <S%G3686><s%> written, <S%G1125><s%> KING <S%G935><s%> OF KINGS, <S%G935><s%> AND LORD <S%G2962><s%> OF LORDS. <S%G2962><s%>

And I saw <S%G1492><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> in the sun; <S%G2246><s%> and he cried <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the fowls <S%G3732><s%> that fly <S%G4072><s%> in the middle <S%G3321><s%> of heaven, <S%G3321><s%> Come <S%G1205><s%> and gather <S%G4863><s%> yourselves together <S%G4863><s%> to the supper <S%G1173><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%>

That you may eat <S%G5315><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of kings, <S%G935><s%> and the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of captains, <S%G5506><s%> and the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of mighty <S%G2478><s%> men, and the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of horses, <S%G2462><s%> and of them that sit <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them, and the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men, both <S%G5037><s%> free <S%G1658><s%> and bond, <S%G1401><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> small <S%G3398><s%> and great. <S%G3173><s%>

And I saw <S%G1492><s%> the beast, <S%G2342><s%> and the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and their armies, <S%G4753><s%> gathered <S%G4863><s%> together <S%G4863><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> war <S%G4171><s%> against <S%G3326><s%> him that sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the horse, <S%G2462><s%> and against <S%G3326><s%> his army. <S%G4753><s%>

And the beast <S%G2342><s%> was taken, <S%G4084><s%> and with him the false <S%G5578><s%> prophet <S%G5578><s%> that worked <S%G4160><s%> miracles <S%G4592><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> him, with which <S%G3739><s%> he deceived <S%G4105><s%> them that had received <S%G2983><s%> the mark <S%G5480><s%> of the beast, <S%G2342><s%> and them that worshipped <S%G4352><s%> his image. <S%G1504><s%> These <S%G3588><s%> both <S%G1417><s%> were cast <S%G906><s%> alive <S%G2198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a lake <S%G3041><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%> burning <S%G2545><s%> with brimstone. <S%G2303><s%>

And the remnant <S%G3062><s%> were slain <S%G615><s%> with the sword <S%G4501><s%> of him that sat <S%G2521><s%> on the horse, <S%G2462><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> sword proceeded <S%G1607><s%> out of his mouth: <S%G4750><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the fowls <S%G3732><s%> were filled <S%G5526><s%> with their flesh. <S%G4561><s%>
